input: i tried to make a cheerful comment about fitting her in but i feel really unwelcome
i feel that uncertain should be a better communicator
im feeling quite adventurous and tried out those drinks that i just normally read through the pages of pocketbooks
i feeling handsome q where is this lyrics from oh when you look at me like that my darling what did you expect

i am also now down lbs so i feel so good i still have another to go at least well thats the plan anyway
